title: Rajagiriya Land For Sale
details:
220 Perches Prime Land for Sale@ Rajagiriya.
Highly Commercial hub.
100 from Parliament road.
20 foot 3 roadway's enter to the land.
Land facing the diyawanna stream.
250 foot wide water frontage.

Well secured convenient location in the Colombo city.

Walking distance to all Super Markets, Schools, Hospitals, Banks, Places of worship, Business institutions.
It is only 15 minutes drive to the Colombo city center from this location & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs.
Ideal for both residential and business purposes in view of it’s prime location and the ever increasing value of land in the area, with all urban facilities.
Clear title.
4.5 Million per perch ( Negotiable).

## Rajagiriya new flyover project ###

The first phase of the government’s planned longest overhead bridge in Rajagiriya which broke ground is set to be completed at the end of 2017 and the second is scheduled to be completed in late 2018.
The Road Development Authority states that this 534-metre long, four lane overhead bridge costing Rs. 5 billion and funded under the relief credit line by the Government of Spain, will be the longest of this nature in Sri Lanka.

Opportunity that should not be missed.. May never come again.
